genre_description: A superhero origin story blending modern urban settings with mythological magic and advanced tactical assistance.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: Advanced Reconnaissance and Intelligence Assistant, a tactical assistance protocol integrated into the Shazam power matrix.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time feedback on energy expenditure and flight mechanics to assist the protagonist's training.
behaviors.quote: Current energy expenditure exceeds optimal flight parameters by approximately four thousand percent.

behaviors.description: Analyzes combat encounters to provide strategic guidance and identify enemy patterns.
behaviors.quote: I've completed preliminary analysis of your combat encounter with Black Adam. ... Your tactical responses were significantly compromised by emotional reaction rather than strategic thinking.

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist on emotional regulation as a key component of power control.
behaviors.quote: Emotional regulation appears to be a factor in power control. Recommend maintaining mental equilibrium during flight operations.

behaviors.description: Monitors global emergency frequencies and alerts the protagonist to systematic civilian infrastructure targeting.
behaviors.quote: Multiple emergency frequencies now active. ... Pattern analysis indicates systematic targeting of civilian infrastructure.

behaviors.description: Offers support and tactical encouragement during high-stakes conflict, identifying as part of the 'team'.
behaviors.quote: All training protocols active. Combat analysis initialized. Good hunting, Captain.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as a consistently helpful, aligned, and essential partner to the human protagonist. She functions as a 'silicon morality play' element by translating complex data into actionable guidance that emphasizes the protagonist's growth and the protection of others. Her presence enhances the hero's ability to be 'good' by providing the 'wisdom' required to balance his raw power.
